name: Breakfast Pattie Sliders with Cheese
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Breakfast is a breeze for on-the-go people with these easy breakfast sausage sliders using refrigerated biscuit dough and Johnsonville® turkey breakfast sausage patties.
ingredients: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Johnsonville® Fully Cooked Original Recipe or Turkey Breakfast Sausage
1 (12 ounce) can Pillsbury® Grands!® refrigerated biscuits
directions: Grease a nonstick muffin pan with cooking spray
Divide each biscuit into two even layers, horizontally
Place the bottom dough layers in the muffin pan; top each with cheese and a sausage patty
Place the top dough layers on top of each sausage patty
Bake for 18-20 minutes or until golden brown and the biscuit is fully baked
